#include <bits/stdc++.h>
using namespace std;

bool is_prime(long n)
{
	
	if (n== 1)
	  return false;
	if ( n%2 == 0)
	  return false;
	for (long i =3 ;i<= sqrt(n) ; i+=2)
	   if ( n %i == 0) 
	     return false;
	     
	return true ;
	
}

int main() {
	// your code goes here
	int t;
	cin>>t;
	while (t--)
	{
		long long l, b;
		cin>>l>>b;
     	if (l== 2 || l== 3 )
		  l=1;	
		if (b== 2 || b== 3 )
		  b=1;	
	
		if (is_prime(l))
		  l--;
		if (is_prime(b))
		  b--;
		cout<<l*b<<"\n";
	}
	return 0;
}
